page.title: 11EDUCATION
page.content: Garras is situated just outside of Mawgan.This contains the only educational building in the area.This school has 45 pupils all coming from Gweek,Mawgan and Garras.Garras school was built in{1877}and has been getting fewer peopleas time has passed.The school has an age range of 4.5-11 but recently a playgroup was installed.The headmaster had to fight tooth and nail against the local educatoinal authority to get it.The schoolhas a very tiny library.The favorite authors are Willard Price and Enid Blyton.The school meals are cooked at cury.A typical day would be assembly at 9.00 realy it's a normal day of maths and english.They have games on Monday and they go swimming at Culdrose.they go to school at 8.45 and go home at 3.15. { }
